alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 3:24AM MDT until May 14 at 3:49AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest South Dakota, including the following county, Oglala Lakota. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 319 AM MDT, Doppler radar and gauge reports indicated recent heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen since Thursday. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pine Ridge, Porcupine, Kyle, Manderson, Wounded Knee, Batesland, Porcupine Butte Housing, Evergreen, Sharps Corner, Goose Neck Housing, Thunder Valley, Wolf Creek Housing, Lonesome Valley, Calico, Kyle North Route Housing, Wakpamni, Number 4 and Pine Ridge Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
